https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/senio: Acclaim Technical Services, founded in 2000, is a leading language and intelligence services company supporting a wide range of U.S. Federal agencies. We are an Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP) company, which is uncommon within our business sector. We see this as a significant strength, and it shows: ATS is consistently ranked as a top workplace among DC area firms and continues to grow.We are actively hiring a Data Scientist to join our Department of Homeland Security Division working in McLean, VA. The Data Scientist will contribute to building new analytical tools and packages across the enterprise and will be expected to collaborate with team members in a highly technical environment. In this role you will support a fast-paced and growing data science team working on projects critical to National Security.ResponsibilitiesThe Data Scientist will be expected to build statistical models, test hypotheses, interpret, summarize, visualize, and succinctly report on data findings.The Data Scientist will perform research on various data sources, to include unstructured data using quantitative and qualitative content analytics.The Data Scientist will construct and perform complex database search queries in multiple databases using SQL and API interfaces.The Scientist will perform web scraping and apply various techniques for processing unstructured data. Scientist will leverage automation and machine learning to manage data, predict scenarios and make recommendations.The Data Scientist will contribute to building new analytical tools and packages across the enterprise and will be expected to collaborate with team members in a highly technical environment.The Data Scientist will be expected to learn and leverage emerging technologies including AWS and Git.Required Education & Experience Bachelor’s degree in a highly quantitative subject or related field ( for example, statistics, mathematics, economics, or related field) In order to qualify as a Journeyman, candidates are required to have a BS degree + a minimum of 3 years of applicable work experience.
